thread.title: Andrew W.K.'s Smartphone App Gives You a Bloody Nose
thread.title_full: Andrew W.K.'s Smartphone App Gives You a Bloody Nose

author: Lars Brandle
title: Andrew W.K.'s Smartphone App Gives You a Bloody Nose
text:
COMMENTS 
Party animal Andrew W.K. wants to give you a bloody nose. ..no punching needed. 
The New York rocker, motivational speaker and Party Party leader has shared a smartphone App which gives you the look from his gory artwork for 2002’s I Get Wet, without any actual pain. 
The App also lets users digitally don Andrew W.K.’s dirty white t-shirt and add his long locks to any photo, and there’s an option for a blood flow graphic saved as a GIF. 
The Party Hard Bloody Nose App is available for Android and Apple users and can be downloaded here . 
Party on!
